1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 import rospy
3 from drone.msg import Joystick
4 import socket
5 
6 
7 class JoystickRepeater:
8  ROS_IP = "192.168.1.84"
9  PORT = 1234
10 
11  def __init__(self):
12  rospy.init_node("joystick_driver_node")
13  self.pub = rospy.Publisher('joystick_state', Joystick, queue_size=2)
14  self.msg = Joystick()
15 
16 
17 
18  self.sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_DGRAM)
19  self.sock.bind(("192.168.88.1", 1234))
20 
21  def parse(self, esp8266_data):
22  print(esp8266_data[0])
23  if esp8266_data[0] == 0x77:
24  self.msg.left_x = esp8266_data[4] | esp8266_data[5] << 8
25  self.msg.left_y = esp8266_data[6] | esp8266_data[7] << 8
26  self.msg.right_x = esp8266_data[8] | esp8266_data[9] << 8
27  self.msg.right_y = esp8266_data[10] | esp8266_data[11] << 8
28 
29  self.msg.Short.A = esp8266_data[14]
30  self.msg.Short.B = esp8266_data[15]
31  self.msg.Short.C = esp8266_data[16]
32  self.msg.Short.D = esp8266_data[17]
33  self.msg.Short.Lsw = esp8266_data[18]
34  self.msg.Short.Rsw = esp8266_data[19]
35  self.msg.Short.HOLD = esp8266_data[20]
36  self.msg.Short.LED = esp8266_data[21]
37  self.msg.Short.L = esp8266_data[22]
38  self.msg.Short.R = esp8266_data[23]
39 
40  self.msg.Long.A = esp8266_data[24]
41  self.msg.Long.B = esp8266_data[25]
42  self.msg.Long.C = esp8266_data[26]
43  self.msg.Long.D = esp8266_data[27]
44  self.msg.Long.Lsw = esp8266_data[28]
45  self.msg.Long.Rsw = esp8266_data[29]
46  self.msg.Long.HOLD = esp8266_data[30]
47  self.msg.Long.LED = esp8266_data[31]
48  self.msg.Long.L = esp8266_data[32]
49  self.msg.Long.R = esp8266_data[33]
50 
51  self.msg.pressed_buttons = esp8266_data[34] | esp8266_data[35] << 8
52  self.msg.State = esp8266_data[36]
53  self.msg.Battery = esp8266_data[12] | esp8266_data[13] << 8
54  self.msg.SpeedMode = esp8266_data[37]
55  self.msg.LightMode = esp8266_data[38]
56  print_msg = [
57  self.msg.left_x,
58  self.msg.right_x,
59  self.msg.right_y,
60  self.msg.left_y,
61  self.msg.Battery,
62  self.msg.Short,
63  self.msg.Long,
64  self.msg.pressed_buttons,
65  self.msg.State,
66  self.msg.SpeedMode,
67  self.msg.LightMode
68  ]
69  print(print_msg)
70  return True
71  return False
72 
73  def run(self):
74  rate = rospy.Rate(1000)
75  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
76  print("waiting...")
77  data, addr = self.sock.recvfrom(1024)
78  data = [byte for byte in data]
79  print(data)
80  if self.parse(data):
81  print("PARSED")
82  self.pub.publish(self.msg)
83  rate.sleep()
84 
85 
86 if __name__ == '__main__':
87  repeater = JoystickRepeater()
88  try:
89  repeater.run()
90  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
91  pass
